description:
About Pow.bio

Founded by a UC Berkeley Ph.D. graduate and a SynBio veteran, Pow.bio is revolutionizing the $500B biomanufacturing market by building a self-driving fermenter platform that enables cost-effective scale-up solutions across a wide array of strains, organisms, and products.

About the Position

We are looking for a skilled and enthusiastic Data Scientist to become part of our expanding team. As a member of the computing team, you will report to our CTO and collaborate closely with our fermentation R&D team to develop a machine learning-driven, continuous optimization platform. Your role will be supporting and developing our model-predictive automatic fermentation software platform. Additionally, you will contribute to our internal research and development initiatives, focusing on the design, construction, and resolution of challenges within continuous manufacturing platforms across various processes and product categories.

Responsibilitie
Apply now and work remotely at Pow.bio
